text: Ta dlya toho, shchob zayavlyaty shcho vony ubyly Messiah, Isusa, syna Mary, kur'yera BOHA. Faktychno, vony nikoly zbytyy yo, vony nikoly ne ne crucified yo - vony buly zrobleni shchob podumaty shcho vony. Vsi fraktsiya khto dysputuyutʹ u tsiy materiyi ye povnyy sumnivu shchodo tsʹoho pytannya. Vony ne volodiyutʹ znannyam; vony tilʹky prypuskayutʹ. Dlya pevni, vony nikoly ne ubyly yoho
